categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Tumul was a male individual who served the Sith Empire as a Sith Lord during the Great Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. Wearing a gold and red set of armor including a helmet, he worked selling equipment in the supplies section of the Vaiken Spacedock, a space station positioned within the Imperial fleet.

Tumul was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as an Imperial operations gear vendor within the Imperial fleet. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
